alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Floyd; Johnson; Magoffin; Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 1:50PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Morgan, southwestern Johnson, northwestern Floyd, northeastern Breathitt and Magoffin Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 149 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Logville to Lambric. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Daisydell, Lambric, Tiptop, Carver Station, Carver and Conley Station around 155 PM EDT. Coon, Duco and Swampton around 200 PM EDT. Salyersville, Evanston, Lacey, Quod, Ophir, Flat Fork, Perlie, Cyrus and Stringtown around 205 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Win, Minefork, Waldo, Wheelersburg, Ordway, Leatha, Fredville, Brownlow, Falcon, Gapville, Hargis, Gunlock, Niles, Orchard, Mid, Oil Springs, Hippo, Barnetts Creek, Pyramid and Ballot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
